detail_desc: LOVE STORIES x H&M. Patterned bikini bottoms with an elasticated waist, overlocked frilled edges, narrow sides and a high-cut back. Lined.
LOVE STORIES x H&M. Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low waist, frill trim, ties at the sides and cutaway coverage at the back.
LOVE STORIES x H&M. Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low waist, frill trim, ties at the sides and cutaway coverage at the back.
LOVE STORIES x H&M. Triangle bikini top with overlocked frilled edges, lightly padded cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and narrow adjustable shoulder straps.
LOVE STORIES x H&M. Triangle bikini top with overlocked frilled edges, lightly padded cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and narrow adjustable shoulder straps.
Short shorts in a mulberry silk weave. High waist with wide elastication and a small frill trim at the top, and pockets in the side seams.

LOVE STORIES x H&M. V-neck swimsuit with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and lightly padded cups with removable inserts that shape the bust. Deep V-neck at the back and a narrow, elastic belt that accentuates the waist. Lined.
LOVE STORIES x H&M. Fully lined bandeau bikini top with wide smocking front and back and a frill trim top and bottom. Concealed silicone trim at the top. No fasteners.
LOVE STORIES x H&M. Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low waist, frill trim at the top and cutaway coverage at the back.
LOVE STORIES x H&M. Wide tunic in an airy cotton weave with a V-neck and small stand-up collar with ties at the front. Long, wide sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs, and tiers to the hem.
LOVE STORIES x H&M. T-shirt in soft cotton with a round neck, print motif on the front, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and a straight-cut hem.
LOVE STORIES x H&M. Sarong in cool, printed cotton. Can be worn around the hips or tied and worn as a dress. Size 170x170 cm.
LOVE STORIES x H&M. Large, boxy beach bag in patterned cotton twill with a soft base and two handles that double up as shoulder straps. Size approx. 19x35x36x50 cm.
Ankle-length dress in soft jersey with a V-neck, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and slits in the sides.
Ankle-length dress in soft jersey with a V-neck, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and slits in the sides.
Ankle-length dress in soft jersey with a V-neck, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and slits in the sides.
LOVE STORIES x H&M. Off-the-shoulder swimsuit with a concealed silicone trim and two tiers of flounces at the top. Lined.
LOVE STORIES x H&M. Block-coloured swimsuit in scuba fabric with a fixed elastic belt that accentuates the waist. Zip with a long tab at the back and a lined gusset.

LOVE STORIES x H&M. Pyjamas with a blouse and pair of shorts in a cotton weave. Blouse with a small stand-up collar and gathers and concealed press-studs at the top of the front. Long sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs. Shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist and frill trim at the hems.

LOVE STORIES x H&M. Waist bag in scuba fabric with one large zipped compartment and a small pocket with a press-stud on the outside at the front. Adjustable waist strap with a large plastic snap lock. Lined. Size approx. 12x32 cm.
LOVE STORIES x H&M. Fisherman’s hat in patterned cotton twill with a text print and a fringed edge around the brim. Width of brim approx. 5 cm.
LOVE STORIES x H&M. Bath sheet in soft cotton terry with an intarsia motif. Hanger on one long side and fringes on the short sides.
Cropped top in crinkled viscose with crocheted shoulder straps and crocheted trims at the top and front. Buttons down the front and narrow elastication at the hem.

Blouse in an airy cotton weave with broderie anglaise. Small, smocked, frill-trimmed stand-up collar, a V-shaped opening at the front with scalloped edges and short, raglan sleeves with scalloped edges. Unlined.
V-neck blouse in a soft viscose weave with a small, frill-trimmed stand-up collar, ties at the neckline with tassels at the ends, and raglan butterfly sleeves that continue down the sides.
V-neck blouse in a soft viscose weave with a small, frill-trimmed stand-up collar, ties at the neckline with tassels at the ends, and raglan butterfly sleeves that continue down the sides.
V-neck blouse in a soft viscose weave with a small, frill-trimmed stand-up collar, ties at the neckline with tassels at the ends, and raglan butterfly sleeves that continue down the sides.
Blouse in an airy weave with an elasticated neckline and small frilled collar. Long raglan balloon sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Blouse in an airy weave with an elasticated neckline and small frilled collar. Long raglan balloon sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Blouse in an airy weave with an elasticated neckline and small frilled collar. Long raglan balloon sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Calf-length dress in soft Tencel™ lyocell denim with a wrapover front with ties at one side and a flounced edge. Long puff sleeves with elasticated cuffs.
V-neck strappy top in ribbed jersey with buttons down the front.

Fitted top in rib jersey with 3/4-length sleeves and a wide neckline that is low-cut at the back.
Fitted top in rib jersey with 3/4-length sleeves and a wide neckline that is low-cut at the back.
Fine-knit trainer socks in fast-drying functional fabric with a mesh section over the foot and a slightly higher shaft at the heel for optimum comfort.

Top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a print motif and reversible sequins. Slightly wider neckline, long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a print motif and reversible sequins. Slightly wider neckline, long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a print motif and reversible sequins. Slightly wider neckline, long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Cheeky, bikini bottoms with a low, V-shaped waistband made of two wide elastic straps. Wide sides and a high cut at the back.

Sleeveless dress in soft, organic cotton jersey. Narrow cut with elastication at the top, narrow shoulder straps with a decorative bow, a smocked seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt.
Sleeveless dress in soft, organic cotton jersey. Narrow cut with elastication at the top, narrow shoulder straps with a decorative bow, a smocked seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt.
Triangle bikini top with lined, padded cups, removable inserts and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps. Wide elastic hem and a metal fastener at the back.

Collar in fleece with a rounded hem and a ribbed polo neck containing glittery threads.

Sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with a wide neckline, short cap sleeves and a decorative knot detail at the hem.
Fully lined swimsuit with a deep V-neck at the front, cups with removable inserts and ties that fasten at the back of the neck.
Fully lined swimsuit with a deep V-neck at the front, cups with removable inserts and ties that fasten at the back of the neck.

Lined bandeau bikini top with flounces at the top, lightly padded cups, detachable shoulder straps that tie at the back of the neck, and a fastener at the back. Concealed silicone trim at the top of the back, and side support.

Lined bandeau bikini top with flounces at the top, lightly padded cups, detachable shoulder straps that tie at the back of the neck, and a fastener at the back. Concealed silicone trim at the top of the back, and side support.
Two pairs of leaf-shaped earrings in plastic and metal. Length 6 cm.
Cheeky, waist-high bikini bottoms with a V-shaped waistband made of two elastic straps. Wide sides and a high cut at the back. Lined.

Base layer set in fast-drying functional fabric with jacquard-patterned sections. Top with long raglan sleeves, contrasting colour seams and ribbing around the neckline and cuffs. Bottoms with ribbing at the waist and hems. The set is designed with the minimal number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility.

Base layer set in fast-drying functional fabric with jacquard-patterned sections. Top with long raglan sleeves, contrasting colour seams and ribbing around the neckline and cuffs. Bottoms with ribbing at the waist and hems. The set is designed with the minimal number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility.

Set with a T-shirt and pair of shorts in soft cotton jersey. T-shirt with a print motif on the front. Printed shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist, a fake fly and fake pockets.
Nylon gym bag with a contrasting colour drawstring at the top. Can be carried as a backpack. Size 35x45 cm.
Backpack in woven fabric with a print motif, a handle and adjustable shoulder straps. Zip at the top, a zipped outer compartment and mesh side compartment. Partly lined. Size 13x27x35 cm.

Trousers in a sturdy Tencel™ lyocell and silk weave with a sheen. High waist, concealed hook-and-eye fastening, zip fly, diagonal side pockets, a welt back pocket and gently tapered legs with creases.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit, patterned viscose with a round neckline and long sleeves.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit, patterned viscose with a round neckline and long sleeves.
Knee-high football socks in fine-knit fast-drying functional yarn with elastication at the top, ankle and foot for best fit. Double layer underneath for extra cushioning.

Imitation leather sandals with a braided foot strap and an adjustable ankle strap with a metal buckle. Imitation leather insoles. Heel 5 cm.

Shirt in a patterned cotton weave with a wide tie collar, buttons down the front and yoke at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem with slits in the sides. Longer at the back.
Shorts in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and contrasting colour trims.
